ResourceHeader.Description:
PHOBOS-2 spacecraft position and velocity
In HEE frame (Heliocentric Earth Ecliptic) with time resolution 6 hours from 1988-07-12 19:59:59.712 to 1988-07-20 19:59:59.712 and then 24 hours from 1988-07-22 00:00:00 to 1989-01-29 00:00:00 In MSO frame (Mars-centric Solar Orbital) with time resolution 1 hour from 1989-01-30 13:59:59.712 to 1989-02-01 15:00:00 and then 10 minutes from 1989-02-01 15:00:00 to 1989-03-26 16:39:59.616. In GSE (Geocentric Solar Ecliptic) frame with 1 min resolution
